00146 
00151   class Exception : public std::runtime_error {
00152     const Exception &operator=(const Exception &); // not assignable
00153 
00154     int m_error;
00155     int m_line;
00156     const char *m_func;
00157     const char *m_file;
00158 
00159   public:
00160     typedef std::runtime_error Parent;
00161 
00162     Exception(int error, int l = 0, const char *fn = 0, const char *fl = 0)
00163         : Parent(""), m_error(error), m_line(l), m_func(fn), m_file(fl),
00164           prev(0) {}
00165     Exception(int error, const String &msg, int l = 0, const char *fn = 0,
00166               const char *fl = 0)
00167         : Parent(msg), m_error(error), m_line(l), m_func(fn), m_file(fl),
00168           prev(0) {}
00169     Exception(int error, const String &msg, const Exception &ex,
00170               int l = 0, const char *fn = 0, const char *fl = 0)
00171         : Parent(msg), m_error(error), m_line(l), m_func(fn), m_file(fl),
00172           prev(new Exception(ex)) {}
00173     // copy ctor is required for exceptions
00174     Exception(const Exception &ex) : Parent(ex), m_error(ex.m_error),
00175         m_line(ex.m_line), m_func(ex.m_func), m_file(ex.m_file) {
00176       prev = ex.prev ? new Exception(*ex.prev) : 0;
00177     }
00178     ~Exception() throw() { delete prev; }
00179 
00180     int code() const { return m_error; }
00181     int line() const { return m_line; }
00182     const char *func() const { return m_func; }
00183     const char *file() const { return m_file; }
00184 
00185     Exception *prev;    // exception chain/list
00186   };
00187 
00188   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Exception &e);
00189 
00193 #define HT_THROW(_code_, _msg_) \
00194   throw Exception(_code_, _msg_, __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__)
00195 
00196 #define HT_THROW2(_code_, _ex_, _msg_) \
00197   throw Exception(_code_, _msg_, _ex_, __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__)
00198 
00199 #define HT_THROWF(_code_, _fmt_, ...) \
00200   throw Exception(_code_, format(_fmt_, __VA_ARGS__), \
00201                   __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__)
00202 
00203 #define HT_THROW2F(_code_, _ex_, _fmt_, ...) \
00204   throw Exception(_code_, format(_fmt_, __VA_ARGS__), _ex_, \
00205                   __LINE__, HT_FUNC, __FILE__)
00206 
00207 #define HT_TRY(_s_, _code_) do { \
00208   try { _code_; } \
00209   catch (Exception &e) { HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, _s_); } \
00210   catch (std::bad_alloc &e) { \
00211     HT_THROW(Error::EXTERNAL, "bad alloc " _s_); \
00212   } \
00213   catch (std::exception &e) { \
00214     HT_THROWF(Error::EXTERNAL, "External exception " _s_ ": %s",  e.what()); \
00215   } \
00216 } while (0)
00217 
00218 
00219 } // namespace Hypertable
